video_prompt: The video depicts an elderly woman sitting on a balcony, looking out and occasionally glancing at a small black and white dog beside her. The background features a weathered, textured wall with peeling paint, indicating an older building. The woman is wearing a red dress and sitting on a chair, while the dog remains still beside her. The ambient sound includes the sound of a dog barking. The woman speaks, saying, 'It will be rainy. Have you brought umbrella with you children?'

speech_prompt.speaker: the old woman
speech_prompt.text: It will be rainy. Have you brought umbrella with you children?
